multiplechoiceresponse.label: Identify the main reason behind the error encountered when running students.pi after modifying students.csv.
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Using commas as delimiters in student's homes.
Incorrect variable names in the code.
Syntax error in the split function.
Missing semicolon at the end of the line.
